SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.decks

Class VirtualDeck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.events.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.decks.Deck<PlayCard>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.decks.VirtualDeck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class VirtualDeck extends Deck<PlayCard>
VirtualDeck allows the client's view to hold an object that looks like an actual Deck, but doesn't actually contain any data regarding the cards inside the matching server's deck.
See Also:

    • draw

      public PlayCard draw()
      VirtualDecks don't allow to draw a card.
      Overrides:
      draw in class Deck<PlayCard>
      Returns:
      the drawn element
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - since this kind of deck doesn't allow drawing.

    • setTopOfTheStack

      Allows to change the resource shown on top of the deck.
      Parameters:
      shownResource - the resource on the back of the card on top.

    • getTopOfTheStack

      public Resource getTopOfTheStack()
      Retrieves the Resource type of the card that's currently on top of the deck (which can be empty).
      Overrides:
      getTopOfTheStack in class Deck<PlayCard>
      Returns:
      the element that's on top of the stack null if the deck's empty.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks whether the deck is empty or not.

      The deck's empty if there's no resource to show

      Overrides:
      isEmpty in class Deck<PlayCard>
      Returns:
      true if the deck's empty, false otherwise
